name: Fool's End (itch)
description:
Descend into an intense world of chaotic mining and platforming in Fool's End. Take control of the Fool, a degenerate on a desperate mission to navigate his way out of a tangled system of caves. Dig through and manipulate environmental hazards, evade powerful monsters, smack enemies into lava and bombs, and prepare for an adventure in a land of chaos.

Explore 16 fast-paced levels filled with zesty 8-bit graphics, explosive situations, crunchy animations, and creative system-driven gameplay. Beware of powerful enemies like gargoyles and fire breathing lions and prepare for a journey into the underground void of Fool's End, the debut game from Pickled Cactus Games!

Feature list:

  • 16 levels.
  • Fully destructible tile-based terrain. 
  • Unique enemies and environmental hazards.
  • 8-bit pixel art and animations.
  • Bumping dynamic soundtrack.

Controls:

  • WASD or arrow keys to navigate.
  • F or mouse click left to mine.
  • SPACE, W, or UP.
  • DOWN or S to drop from a ledge.

Music Attribution:

"Ether Vox", "Midnight Tale"

Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com)
